categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: General Jan Dodonna of the Alliance to Restore the Republic maintained a personal T-1 shuttle during the early Galactic Civil War. In 0 ABY, Leia Organa and Evaan Verlaine commandeered the T-1 shuttle without permission and broke the quarantine Dodonna had imposed on Base One to go on an unsanctioned mission to rescue the survivors of Alderaan.
